document_data.name: Trende Cafe
document_data.mainbody: '''Trende Cafe''' was an eatery located in the affluent [[Merchant's District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1371}}{{LCRB}}, the [[wizard]] named [[Samman]] was swingled by a group of criminals. These people, [[Marella]], [[Elizza]], [[Moamar]], and [[Rundell]], were members of the warlord [[Myrkyssa Jelan]]'s army that waged war on [[the Vast]] just a year prior. Samman posted a bill that he sought a special magic [[wand]]. The criminals arranged a meeting and sealed the deal at the Trende Cafe.
